macop.callbacks.classicals¶

Classical Checkpoints classes implementations

Classes

BasicCheckpoint(every, filepath)

BasicCheckpoint is used for loading previous computations and start again after loading checkpoint
class macop.callbacks.classicals.BasicCheckpoint(every, filepath)[source]¶

Bases: macop.callbacks.base.Callback

BasicCheckpoint is used for loading previous computations and start again after loading checkpoint

algo¶

{Algorithm} – main algorithm instance reference

every¶

{int} – checkpoint frequency used (based on number of evaluations)

filepath¶

{str} – file path where checkpoints will be saved

load()[source]¶

Load last backup line of solution and set algorithm state (best solution and evaluations) at this backup

run()[source]¶

Check if necessary to do backup based on every variable

setAlgo(algo)¶

Specify the main algorithm instance reference

Parameters

algo – {Algorithm} – main algorithm instance reference

class macop.callbacks.classicals.ContinuousCheckpoint(every, filepath)[source]¶

Bases: macop.callbacks.base.Callback

ContinuousCheckpoint is used for loading previous computations and start again after loading checkpoint (only continuous solution)

algo¶

{Algorithm} – main algorithm instance reference

every¶

{int} – checkpoint frequency used (based on number of evaluations)

filepath¶

{str} – file path where checkpoints will be saved

load()[source]¶

Load last backup line of solution and set algorithm state (best solution and evaluations) at this backup

run()[source]¶

Check if necessary to do backup based on every variable

setAlgo(algo)¶

Specify the main algorithm instance reference

Parameters

algo – {Algorithm} – main algorithm instance reference
